IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To hurt oneself
ali
to hurt a part of one's body
pomeni poškodovati se.

seg.quote: How did you hurt your finger?

sense.def:
Kadar del telesa
hurts
, tam čutimo bolečino.

seg.quote: My leg was beginning to hurt.

sense.def:
To hurt someone
pomeni nekomu povzročiti bolečino ali ga vznemiriti.

seg.quote: She was easily hurt by an unkindness.
He didn't want to hurt her feelings.

sense.def:
To be hurt
pomeni biti poškodovan.

seg.quote: The soldier was obviously badly hurt.

sense.def:
I am hurt
lahko rečemo tudi tedaj, ko smo vznemirjeni zaradi nečesa, kar je nekdo rekel ali storil.

A feeling of hurt
je občutek, ki ga imamo, kadar so z nami grdo ravnali.

Kadar nekaj
hurts someone or something
, na nekoga ali nekaj vpliva slabo.

seg.quote: These policies could destroy small businesses and hurt consumers.
